snippet: Moscow has threatened to cancel the two-decade-old nuclear disarmament program, which has helped rid the former Soviet Union of thousands of nuclear weapon.
abstract: Pres Obama calls on Russia to renew two-decade-old nuclear disarmament program that Moscow has threatened to cancel as two sides try to figure out future of rocky relationship now that elections in both countries are over.
lead_paragraph: Moscow has threatened to cancel the two-decade-old nuclear disarmament program, which has helped rid the former Soviet Union of thousands of nuclear weapon.

headline.main: Obama Calls on Russia to Renew Weapons Pact
